name: Aurora&Bolby
description:
Aurora, a little girl that loves art, travels with his guide dog Bolby, looking for her own memories.

This little concept was created for the Brackeys "Light" Game Jam.

Coding: Garlim12
Modeling: Guatfader
Music: Pinos Records (Youtube link)

Special thanks:
Original idea: SplitBasilisck

Instructions:
-You have to move Aurora with WASD and Bolby with the mouse. He leaves a trail of light through which you can walk. 

Note: We didn't really finish it but this was our first time in a game jam and we definitely learned a lot!
